TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program KSPI-E Interstellar Ships

Articles.Content:
Bussard Interstellar Fusion ships
artistic points are more important than performance HAHA

Please add your ships below! Looking forward to see some really cool designs
Modlist for this specific ship: KSP Interstellar Extended, Firespitter, Airplane Plus (for those little lights)

Really hope that KSPI-E can make the engine nozzle light up very brightly by the fusion plasma, and possibly make the plumes look better and brighter if possible... It's gonna look EPIC

Δv 8.65% c Bussard Fusion Fleet ship
